page.title: 01Pastures South of Hurlford
page.content: This is an ideal area for farming. The main occupation being Dairy Farming. Ayrshire Cattle (brown and white and Fresian Cattle (black and whte) are the main breeds in this area. Sheep are also grazed here. The primary schoolat crossroads has about thirty pupils mainly from farming community. Two equestrian centres are in this area, one at Bowhouse and the other at Dallars The only industril area is that of a bonded warehouse and distribution depot connected to Whisky Industry This is at Barleith. The main railway line south runs through the middle of the area and is double track.
